channel.title: CVE Feed for e-Excellence Inc. -- U-Office Force
channel.description: The latest CVEs for e-Excellence Inc. -- U-Office Force

item.title: CVE-2022-39024|2024-09-16T20:07:27.280Z -- e-excellence%20inc. -- u-office%20force
item.description: U-Office Force Bulletin function has insufficient filtering for special characters. An unauthenticated remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability to inject JavaScript and perform XSS (Reflected Cross-Site Scripting) attack.

item.title: CVE-2022-39025|2024-09-16T21:57:01.363Z -- e-excellence%20inc. -- u-office%20force
item.description: U-Office Force PrintMessage function has insufficient filtering for special characters. An unauthenticated remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability to inject JavaScript and perform XSS (Reflected Cross-Site Scripting) attack.

item.title: CVE-2022-39026|2024-09-16T19:05:41.606Z -- e-excellence%20inc. -- u-office%20force
item.description: U-Office Force UserDefault page has insufficient filtering for special characters in the HTTP header fields. A remote attacker with general user privilege can exploit this vulnerability to inject JavaScript and perform XSS (Stored Cross-Site Scripting) attack.

item.title: CVE-2022-39021|2024-09-16T20:47:29.662Z -- e-excellence%20inc. -- u-office%20force
item.description: U-Office Force login function has an Open Redirect vulnerability. An unauthenticated remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability to redirect user to arbitrary website.
